graceful_flame.name: Graceful Flame
graceful_flame.desc: Conjure a campfire for you and your comrades to rest by.

flame_blind.name: Flame Blind
flame_blind.desc: Shoot a projectile that explodes after a short delay and blinds those looking at it.

flame_of_denial.name: Flame Of Denial
flame_of_denial.desc: While active, you get right back up after being knocked.
